title: Skiing Near Boston
name: Skiing Near Boston
description:
A Map by Tracy_the_astonishing

This map shows you where to go skiing without driving more than a couple hours.

properties.name: Blue Hills Ski Area (about half and hour away)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 4001 Washington Street, Canton, MA 02021 We went out here for an evening of skiing. It was pretty crowded and crawling with teenagers. It seemed that several high school ski teams were there practicing. Lessons To make reservations call 781-828-5070 Includes All day snow pass (lift ticket), rental, and 1 hour lesson Weekdays/Non-Holiday 6 group 1 private Weekends/Holidays 5 Group lesson 02 private Lift Ticket Rates 2007 Mon-Fri 5-1 Sat, Sun, Holidays 7-3 Open until 9 pm, except Sundays when they close at 5. 2007 Vacation Ski Camp 50 for 5 days. 9am-5pm with lessons from 10-2. Register before January 31

properties.name: Wachusett Mountain (about 1 hour and 15 minutes away)
properties.description: Posted by Tracy_the_astonishing 499 Mountain Road, Princeton, MA 01541Weather Cam Polar Kids Lessons RATES: Weekdays - 1/2 Day Sessions 9:30 am - 12 pm or 1 pm - 3:30 pm 1 Session..................0 1 Session Rentals...7 Weekends & Holidays Half Day Sessions/9:30 am - 12 pm or 1 pm - 3:30 pm Full Day Sessions/9:30 am - 3:30 pm 1 Session (full day).....................0 1 Session (1/2 day)....................0 1 Session Equipment Rental...0 Lunch (2 menu options)............. Lift Tickets are not required during the lesson. Discounted lift tickets can be purchased at the Polar Kids Desk after the lesson.
